title: Alpha client stating that I haven't signed up for the alpha
body:
Hi,

I've recently been accepted into the alpha client testing.

Downloading was a breeze, everything was fine until I tried to log in and I cannot do so because "You have not signed up to the alpha client" or something like that.

So I thought "You know, let's restart."

I restart the client and instantly as i double click, Bugsplat comes up, every single time.

If someone has a solution for me I would greatly appreciate it.

Thanks
